attributes.action: Help Ban 'Mums Killed Moms Against Autistic Children'
attributes.additional_details:
https://m.facebook.com/profile.php?id=895572550463415

This page is discrimation.

The page uses extreme titles and when people comment or ask questions, we get targeted with hate comments.

So many parents and children are outraged with the page, they don't support autism but use allot of hate speech.

They want autism baned. They are the same users as 'moms against autistic children'
